text: Sigfrid Mattsson, born 19 September 1917, dead 27 August 2009, was a Swedish cross-country skier. Representing Skarpnäcks IF in club competitions, he won Vasaloppet in 1952. == References == Category:1917 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Swedish male cross-country skiers Category:Vasaloppet winners
title: Sigfrid Mattsson
